Annonation

  1. @BeforeClass - Once
  2. @Before - Always called before the each test executed
  3. @Test - Test Case
  4. @After. - Always called after the each test executed
  5. @AfterClass - Once
  6. @Ignore - Ignore Test to be executed

JUNIT5

  • @BeforeEach - @before
  • @AfterEach - @After
